title: Chiefs-Broncos, Jalen Ramsey, GM Poll, & NCAAF picks
itunes:title: Chiefs-Broncos, Jalen Ramsey, GM Poll, & NCAAF picks
description:
Colin brings Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes down to Earth and gives his reasons why Kansas City could lose to Denver tonight, why he disagrees with a possible reason CB Jalen Ramsey could leave the Rams after this season, why the new NBA GM Poll is ridiculous, and his three college football picks for this week. Guests include Marcedes Lewis, Peter King, Albert Breer, and Cuttino Mobley.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
